SELECT t.code ,t.user_id ,t.to_user ,t.status ,t.type ,t.create_datetime FROM tstd_user_relation t
ORDER BY t.code DESC

select (@rowNO:= @rowNo+1) as row_no, a.to_user, ifnull((select total_amount from tstd_account where user_id = a.to_user and currency='TPP') * #{weightRate1}+ (select sum(amount) from try_adopt_order_tree) * #{weightRate2},0) as weight, (select count(*) from try_adopt_order_tree where current_holder = a.to_user) as certificate_count, ifnull((select amount from tstd_account where user_id = a.to_user and currency='TPP'),0) tpp_amount from (select to_user from tstd_user_relation where user_id=#{userId}) a,(select @rowNO:=0) b order by (ifnull((select total_amount from tstd_account where user_id = a.to_user and currency='TPP') * #{weightRate1}+ (select sum(amount) from try_adopt_order_tree) * #{weightRate2},0)) desc

select count(*) from (select to_user from tstd_user_relation where user_id=#{userId}) a order by (ifnull((select total_amount from tstd_account where user_id = a.to_user and currency='TPP') * #{weightRate1}+ (select sum(amount) from try_adopt_order_tree) * #{weightRate2},0)) desc
